title: Must See!! Gorgeous 1 Bed on the Lake in Gold Coast!
posting_body: Amazing 1 bed in the Gold Coast.
Very updated, large one bed unit.
You will absolutely love this apartment!
Walk into the elegant lobby and immediately feel at home with the 24/7 concierge service.
This building features an excellent resort-style outdoor pool, a state-of-the art fitness center, and expansive sundeck.
Stay connected in the library, where you can easily work from home and utilize the computers and printer.
You can also catch the big game, host parties, and more in our resident lounge (can be reserved through the resident app, as well as the resident guest suite).
Units feature excellent open kitchens with stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, dishwasher, microwave, garbage disposal.
Most features hardwood flooring, private balconies.
Lots of closet space in these properties, with additional storage available for rent.
*NOTE: pricing fluctuates day-to-day based on move date and lease terms.
Photos are of the model unit, schedule a tour with your agent to see exact availability
